mapper.update: update WS_AJ_${fjm} set AH = #{ah,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FJM = #{fjm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FYDM = #{fydm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AJZTMC = #{ajztmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LASTUPDATETIME = #{lastupdatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, XMLBASE = #{xmlbase,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, XMLFILE = #{xmlfile,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, JARQ = #{jarq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LARQ = #{larq,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where TDHAJID = #{tdhajid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
